thread.title: The Tilted Kilt Pub & Eatery Announces Sponsorship With Korbin Forrister For NASCAR Camping World Truck Series
thread.title_full: The Tilted Kilt Pub & Eatery Announces Sponsorship With Korbin Forrister For NASCAR Camping World Truck Series - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: The Tilted Kilt Pub & Eatery Announces Sponsorship With Korbin Forrister For NASCAR Camping World Truck Series
text:
The Tilted Kilt Pub & Eatery
LAS VEGAS , Oct. 1, The Tilted Kilt Pub & Eatery is thrilled to announce a partnership with NASCAR driver Korbin Forrister , beginning with the NASCAR Camping World Truck Series race at Las Vegas Motor Speedway Oct. 3 . Tilted Kilt Race Team will additionally participate in the Talladega Superspeedway on October 24 th , Martinsville Speedway on October 31 st , Texas Motor Speedway on November 6 th and Phoenix International Race on November 13 th .
Four of the World Famous Tilted Kilt Girls will accompany Forrister at each track to cheer on the driver in their Kilt Girl costumes.
Forrister expressed his gratitude for the sponsorship, saying, "A big thanks to Tilted Kilt as I am looking forward to finishing the season officially partnered back with them again. The food is great and the atmosphere is great. My fans love the Tilted Kilt girls, as well, so it will be great to see them out at the track."
With a custom Tilted Kilt pickup truck and Forrister's talent, this partnership is sure to bring home the win. Matt Casto, CEO of The Sports Agency, said, "We're so excited to be partnering up with Tilted Kilt as they're a great fit for our team and we think we're a great fit for their brand."
The Tilted Kilt Pub & Eatery will host a pre-race party Oct. 2 at the Linq location in Las Vegas for all NASCAR fans. Forrister will be on hand to greet fans, sign autographs during the event and will be available for interviews from 7:00 pm – 7:30 pm . The official Tilted Kilt branded truck also will be parked in front of the venue for photo opportunities.
The NASCAR Camping World Truck Series takes to the track at Las Vegas Motor Speedway for the Rhino Linings 350 Saturday, Oct. 3 , at 10 p.m. ET (FS1).
About Tilted Kilt
Tilted Kilt, known as "The Best Looking Sports Pub You've Ever Seen," has over 100 units in operation throughout the U.S. and Canada , with additional 20 Pubs in various stages of development. Tilted Kilt is uniquely different than other sports bars because of its theme that combines Celtic décor, humorous and slightly bawdy limericks and sexy cast members with great food, drinks and a fun, entertaining atmosphere. In 2015, Tilted Kilt was named one of America's Top 10 Fastest Growing Restaurants by CNBC. The original restaurant concept was developed in the Rio Hotel in Las Vegas in 2003. For more information, go to www.tiltedkilt.com .
